short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hover over an Imperial unit on any web page to get a metric conversion

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically detects Imperial units on webpages and adds a tooltip with the metric unit equivalent. Source code here: https://github.com/adityawasudeo/metric-me-up
